command.name: create

help.short: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.
The origin group to use for origins not explicitly included in an origin group. Can be specified as a resource ID or the name of an origin group of this endpoint.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$endpoint.properties.contentTypesToCompress" options="content-types-to-compress" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$endpoint.properties.urlSigningKeys" options="url-signing-keys" group="Properties">

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.
The origin group to use for origins not explicitly included in an origin group. Can be specified as a resource ID or the name of an origin group of this endpoint.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$endpointUpdateProperties.properties.contentTypesToCompress" options="content-types-to-compress" group="Properties">
